content: “And you, son of man, take a sharp sword, take it as a barber’s razor, and pass  over your head and your beard; then take scales to weigh and divide the .

You shall burn with fire one-third in the midst of the city, when the days of the siege are finished; then you shall take one-third and strike around  with the sword, and one-third you shall scatter in the wind: I will draw out a sword after them.
You shall also take a small number of them and bind them in the edge of your
Then take some of them again and throw them into the midst of the fire, and burn them in the fire. From there a fire will go out into all the house of Israel.
“Thus says the Lord : ‘This  Jerusalem; I have set her in the midst of the nations and the countries all around her.

She has rebelled against My judgments by doing wickedness more than the nations, and against My statutes more than the countries that  all around her; for they have refused My judgments, and they have not walked in My statutes.’

Therefore thus says the Lord : ‘Because you have multiplied  more than the nations that  all around you, have not walked in My statutes nor kept My judgments, nor even done according to the judgments of the nations that  all around you’—
therefore thus says the Lord : ‘Indeed I, even I,  against you and will execute judgments in your midst in the sight of the nations.
And I will do among you what I have never done, and the like of which I will never do again, because of all your abominations.
Therefore fathers shall eat  sons in your midst, and sons shall eat their fathers; and I will execute judgments among you, and all of you who remain I will scatter to all the winds.

‘Therefore,  I live,’ says the Lord , ‘surely, because you have defiled My sanctuary with all your detestable things and with all your abominations, therefore I will also diminish  My eye will not spare, nor will I have any pity.

One-third of you shall die of the pestilence, and be consumed with famine in your midst; and one-third shall fall by the sword all around you; and I will scatter another third to all the winds, and I will draw out a sword after them.
‘Thus shall My anger be spent, and I will cause My fury to rest upon them, and I will be avenged; and they shall know that I, the , have spoken  in My zeal, when I have spent My fury upon them.
Moreover I will make you a waste and a reproach among the nations that  all around you, in the sight of all who pass by.

‘So it shall be a reproach, a taunt, a lesson, and an astonishment to the nations that  all around you, when I execute judgments among you in anger and in fury and in furious rebukes. I, the , have spoken.
When I send against them the terrible arrows of famine which shall be for destruction, which I will send to destroy you, I will increase the famine upon you and cut off your supply of bread.
So I will send against you famine and wild beasts, and they will bereave you. Pestilence and blood shall pass through you, and I will bring the sword against you. I, the , have spoken.’ ”
